languages.text: "Когда-то мы с Лорд-капитаном Теодорой высаживались на похожем зеленом мире. Две трети команды сгинули в зубах хищников, а оставшиеся — от лихорадки".
"Lord Captain Theodora and I once landed on a green world similar to this one. Two-thirds of the team perished in the jaws of wild beasts, while the rest died of fever."
languages.original_text: "Когда-то мы с Лорд-капитаном Теодорой высаживались на похожем зеленом мире. Две трети команды сгинули в зубах хищников, а оставшиеся — от лихорадки".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain Theodora and I once landed on a green world similar to this one. Two-thirds of the team perished in the jaws of wild beasts, while the rest died of fever."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “我和西奥多拉领主舰长曾在某个和这里很相似的绿色世界中着陆。整支探险队三分之二的人成了野兽的盘中餐，剩下的人则死于热病。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain Theodora and I once landed on a green world similar to this one. Two-thirds of the team perished in the jaws of wild beasts, while the rest died of fever."

traits.locale_text: “我和西奥多拉领主舰长曾在某个和这里很相似的绿色世界中着陆。整支探险队三分之二的人成了野兽的盘中餐，剩下的人则死于热病。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «La Lord Capitán Theodora y yo aterrizamos una vez en un mundo tan verde como este. Dos tercios del equipo cayó ante las fauces de bestias salvajes y el resto sucumbió a la fiebre».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain Theodora and I once landed on a green world similar to this one. Two-thirds of the team perished in the jaws of wild beasts, while the rest died of fever."

traits.locale_text: «La Lord Capitán Theodora y yo aterrizamos una vez en un mundo tan verde como este. Dos tercios del equipo cayó ante las fauces de bestias salvajes y el resto sucumbió a la fiebre».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン・テオドラと私は、かつてここと同じような緑の星に降り立ったことがある。チームの2/3は野獣の顎で命を落とし、残りは熱病で亡くなった」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain Theodora and I once landed on a green world similar to this one. Two-thirds of the team perished in the jaws of wild beasts, while the rest died of fever."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン・テオドラと私は、かつてここと同じような緑の星に降り立ったことがある。チームの2/3は野獣の顎で命を落とし、残りは熱病で亡くなった」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Captain Theodora und ich sind einst auf einer grünen Welt wie dieser gelandet. Zwei Drittel des Teams starben in den Kiefern wilder Bestien, der Rest am Fieber."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain Theodora and I once landed on a green world similar to this one. Two-thirds of the team perished in the jaws of wild beasts, while the rest died of fever."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain Theodora und ich sind einst auf einer grünen Welt wie dieser gelandet. Zwei Drittel des Teams starben in den Kiefern wilder Bestien, der Rest am Fieber."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Une fois, la seigneure-capitaine Théodora et moi-même avons atterri sur un monde vert semblable à celui-ci. Les deux tiers du groupe sont morts dévorés par des bêtes sauvages, et le reste a été terrassé par la fièvre. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain Theodora and I once landed on a green world similar to this one. Two-thirds of the team perished in the jaws of wild beasts, while the rest died of fever."

traits.locale_text: « Une fois, la seigneure-capitaine Théodora et moi-même avons atterri sur un monde vert semblable à celui-ci. Les deux tiers du groupe sont morts dévorés par des bêtes sauvages, et le reste a été terrassé par la fièvre. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan Theodora ve ben bir keresinde buna benzer yeşil bir dünyaya inmiştik. Ekibin üçte ikisi vahşi hayvanların dişlerinde can verdi, geri kalanıysa yüksek ateşten öldü."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain Theodora and I once landed on a green world similar to this one. Two-thirds of the team perished in the jaws of wild beasts, while the rest died of fever."
